title: The legend of Brita-mart: or A paraphrase upon our provisionall British discipline Inditing it of many severall distempers, and prescribing to the cure. Presented dialogue-wise, betvven Mickle-Worth the patriot, Peny-Wise the worldling, and Mille-Toyle the souldier. The scene being Grayes-Inne Walkes. The author G.T.
author: G. T. (George Tooke), 1595-1675.
